metadata.title: CVE-2024-32660 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol. Prior toversion 3.5.1, a malicious server can crash the FreeRDP client by sendinginvalid huge allocation size. Version 3.5.1 contains a patch for the issue.No known workarounds are available.

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
